allow: Bash(PYTHONPATH=. python -m src.cli.main generate --prompt "a simple tavern with clearer formatting" --visualize)
Bash(PYTHONPATH=. .venv/bin/python -m src.cli.main generate --prompt "a simple tavern with clearer formatting" --use-tools --visualize)
Bash(PYTHONPATH=. .venv/bin/python -m src.cli.main generate --prompt "a simple tavern with one goblin" --use-tools --visualize)
Bash(PYTHONPATH=. .venv/bin/python -m src.cli.main generate --prompt "a small room with two goblins" --use-tools --visualize)
